embeds.description:
👋 Greetings! Are you an enthusiastic architect with a talent for building stunning structures in Minecraft? We're delighted to unveil an exciting chance to join our Builder Team and play a pivotal role in the development of Legacy4J!

## 🤔 What does the Builder role involve?
Builders showcase their skills, collaborate with like-minded individuals, and contribute to shaping a unique Minecraft experience on the world they'll help create.

## ❔ Why become part of our Builder Team?
- Get the opportunity to showcase your creativity and expertise.
- Collaborate with fellow builders to craft immersive environments.

## 📋 How to Apply:
To apply, simply complete the Builder Team Application Form [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdJ1UZIpa2EkHedp8XlU4sZcL6mrwJzrBp5Or1k4OYNY2-vXw/viewform?usp=sf_link). Please ensure all information provided is accurate and comprehensive.

## 🔎 Requirements
- Proficiency in Minecraft building techniques.
- Strong creativity and attention to detail.
- Ability to work collaboratively within a team.

## 📕 Rules
- Applicants must agree to abide by our team guidelines, which can be found [here](https://kyubion-studios.github.io/#-2).

footer.text: All applications will undergo thorough review, and successful candidates will be contacted via Discord.
